resources.string: If you do not accept this, you can\'t use DadGuide.

[Access rights] Permission to save : Monster image, monster Detailed screen requires access to save.
Please allow the following permissions to use DadGuide.
DadGuide does not use your personal information. It bundles some ad code by default (because PadGuide did) but disables them. For more information, go to http://miru.info
